name: Brake Authority ShimanoXT,Grimeca 8-16, Hope Mono M4 Burly Brake
description: Brake Authority’s Burly compound is designed for cross-country and all-mountain riding and lasts a remarkably long time.For Shimano® XT, Grimeca 8 & 16, Cleg DH, SRAM®, and Hope Mono M4 disc brake systems.Sintered pads.Easy to control for progressive braking power.
